review: Tylenol (acetaminophen):This is great. I've had a small pain in my head when I woke up this morning and decided to ignore it. It started getting worse and I realized I was developing a fever around 5:00PM. Even though I had the help of my younger sister to try and reduce the fever and headache, it just hasn't gone away entirely. I was unable to figure out a way to reduce the pain I was in so I called my mother and told her the pain I was in. Conveniently enough, my mother mentioned that we did have Tylenol at home. I went to the room that she told me I'd find it in. I found the Tylenol and downed a pill with water. In just a minute or two, the pain has basically completely vanished and my fever has been reduced greatly.
Tylenol (acetaminophen):I'm not happy with this drug compared to paralgan, aspegic,asperine,...many others which are much more effective

Tylenol (acetaminophen):Great if you have a fever. But if you need pain relief, This won't help. I found It does work better if you have a cup of coffee with it, Otherwise see your doctor for real pain relief. Never take more than the recommended dosage. It can destroy your liver.
Paracetamol (acetaminophen):paracetamol is the best and safe drug. its really amazing

Paracetamol (acetaminophen):I rate it 5, I've had a very high fever and after taking paracetamol it only made it worse. That is why, they suggested me to take paracetamol every 4 hours, as a result, my fever is now gone but my stomach is suffering. I currently have stomach/intestinal disturbances due to paracetamol. This medicine is 50:50
Tylenol (acetaminophen):Pain:  not very effective.  No side effects, easy to use.Fever:  definitely a 10.  Always helps.This got a high rating due to the fever-reducing.

My son has had a lo-grade fever for three days. I've had him on Tylenol every 4 hours but decided to try Motrin instead during his regular dosing schedule. It didn't do a thing. His fever kept rising. Tylenol is the only thing that has worked for him.
A tried and true fever reducer, why waste your money on anything shiny
I always use Tylenol when my kids have a fever, it works great!
Had high fever, took 2 Tylenol extra strength and fever broke within 1/2 hour.  You'll sweat a lot as fever breaks but that's normal per my doctor.
Tylenol (acetaminophen):Works great as a fever reducer.
